math.line2



enum LineIntersection;
Describes types of intersection between line segments.

Intersection
Segments intersect.

CoincidentIntersection
Segments intersect and their lines are coincident.

NoIntersection
Segments don't intersect.

struct Line2(T);
2D line segment between two points.

Vector2!(T) start;
Start point of the line segment.

Vector2!(T) end;
End point of the line segment.

Line2!(T) opCall(T x1, T y1, T x2, T y2);
Fake constructor from 4 numbers

Line2!(T) opCall(Vector2!(T) v1, Vector2!(T) v2);
Fake constructor from 2 vectors

Line2!(T) opSub(Vector2!(T) s);
Subtraction with a vector - used in translation.

void opSubAssign(Vector2!(T) s);
Subtraction-assignment with a vector - used in translation.

Vector2!(T) vector();
Returns direction vector of the line.

Vector2!(T) normal();
Returns normal vector of the line.

T length();
Returns length of the line segment.

T length_squared();
Returns squared length of the line segment.

T point_orientation(Vector2!(T) point);
Determines if point is to the right, left or on the line.

Params:
Vector2!(T) point Point to determine orientation of.

Returns:
Less than 0 if the point is to the left of line, more than 0 if the point is to the right of line, 0 of the point is on the line.

Vector2!(T) closest_point(Vector2!(T) point, bool full_line = true);
Calculates closest point on this line or line segment to given point.

Params:
Vector2!(T) point Point to find the closest point to.
bool full_line Find the closest point of full line of this segment or just on the segment itself?

Returns:
Closest point to point.

T distance(Vector2!(T) point, bool full_line = true);
Calculates distance from this line or line segment to given point.

Params:
Vector2!(T) point Point to calculate distance to.
bool full_line Calculate distance to full line of this segment or just on the segment itself?

Returns:
Distance to point.

Vector2!(T) symmetric_point(Vector2!(T) point);
Returns the point symmetric to given point according to line defined by this segment.

LineIntersection intersect(Line2!(T) l, out Vector2!(T) i);
Tests for intersection with another line segment.

Params:
Line2!(T) l Line segment to test intersection with.
Vector2!(T) i Vector to write intersection point to.

Returns:
true if line segments intersect, false otherwise.
